content.p: Search for jobs with local, national and multinational employers Receive the latest vacancies direct to your inbox from MyCareer Find tips on how to develop your LinkedIn account and understand your online image Developing you network online and in-person, and using it to your advantage Advice for international students interested in gaining a graduate job in the UK Sources of information on your rights at work in the UK telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
